Name: Lieder um 1800/Songs around 1800 Band 2: Rosa & Henry
Notes: Score with biographies and notes on the work. Many pieces for voice were written with 'pianoforte or harp' accompaniment, most of which have fallen into oblivion.
Long Description: This collection includes works by various composers such as Edward Morris, Anne Hunter, Jeanne-Renée de Travanet, Sophie Gail, Pauline Duchambge, Nélia Maillard, and Maria Malibran. The pieces are for voice accompanied by pianoforte or harp, reflecting the musical education of aristocratic and upper-class daughters in France and England around 1800.
Short Description: A collection of songs for voice with pianoforte or harp accompaniment from around 1800, featuring works by various composers.
